quote_first: His awakening faculty would seem to have been slightly out of order that day, however, and he did not arouse until
title: The Four-Masted Cat Boat
author: Charles Battell Loomis

quote_last: on Monday, Lucy tapped at their sitting-room door and said, “If you please, sir, there is a man in black downstairs with a young gentleman.”
title: Blue at the Mizzen
author: Patrick O’Brian
